channel.title: Mesa County|Colorado|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Mesa County|Colorado|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.description: I-70 east approaching Exit 62 - De Beque

item.title: I-70 East - Exit 49
item.description: I-70 east approaching Exit 49 - CO-65 South/To CO-330 East/Grand Mesa/Colbran.

item.title: I-70 East - Exit 47
item.description: I-70 East (Exit 47) - James M Robb Colorado River State Park - Island Acres

item.title: I-70 East - Exit 45
item.description: I-70 east approaching Exit 45 - Cameo

item.title: I-70 East - Exit 42
item.description: I-70 east approaching Exit 42 - To US-6/Palisade.

item.title: I-70 East - Exit 37
item.description: I-70 east approaching Exit 37 - BL-70/Clifton/Delta. This is the eastern end of the Grand Junction business loop.

item.title: I-70 East Exit 19 Offramp at CO-340
item.description: I-70 East Exit 19 Offramp at CO-340 in Fruita. Use CO-340 West to Fruita and Rest Area. Use CO-340 East to Colorado National Monument.

item.title: I-70 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-70 east. Distance to Mack, Loma, and Grand Junction. This is the first distance marker in Colorado on I-70 east.

item.title: I-70 East - Mesa County
item.description: First I-70 reassurance marker eastbound in Colorado.

item.title: I-70 East - Entering Colorado
item.description: Welcome to colorful Colorado on I-70 east. Taken at the Utah-Colorado line.

item.title: I-70 East - Exit 31
item.description: I-70 east at Exit 31 - Horizon Drive.

item.title: I-70 East - Exit 28
item.description: I-70 east at Exit 28 - 24 Road/Redlands Parkway.

item.title: I-70 East - Exit 26
item.description: I-70 east at Exit 26 - BL-70/US-6/US-50/Grand Junction. Continue east on I-70 for Denver. This is the eastern end of the Grand Junction business loop. Grand Junction is the largest city in Colorado west of the Rocky Mountains.

item.title: I-70 East - Grand Junction Exits
item.description: Grand Junction Exits on I-70 east. Next three exits are I-70 Business Loop, 24 Road, and Horizon Drive.

item.title: I-70 East Approaching Exit 19
item.description: I-70 east approaching Exit 19 - US-6/CO-340/Fruita.

item.title: I-70 East - Exit 15
item.description: I-70 East at Exit 15 - CO-139 North/Loma/Rangely.

item.title: I-70 East - Exit 11
item.description: I-70 east at Exit 11 - Mack.

item.title: I-70 East - Entering Colorado
item.description: Welcome to colorful Colorado on I-70 east. Taken at the Utah-Colorado line.

item.title: US-50 East at CO-141 South
item.description: US-50 East at CO-141 South to Gateway and Naturita. Continue east on US-50 for Delta.

item.title: US-50 East Approaching CO-141
item.description: US-50 east approaching CO-141 in Mesa County.

item.title: BL-70 West at US-50
item.description: BL-70 west (Ute St.) at US-50 (5th St.) in Downtown Grand Junction. Turn left on US-50 for Delta and Montrose. Continue straight on Ute St. for BL-70/US-50 west.

item.title: BL-70 West - 29 Road Interchange
item.description: BL-70 west at Teller Road/To 29 Road interchange, in Grand Junction.

item.title: US-6 West/BL-70 West Split
item.description: US-6 West/BL-70 West Split in Grand Junction. Merge right for US-6 West (North Ave.); merge left for BL-70 West.

item.title: US-6/BL-70 West at US-6/BL-70 Split
item.description: US-6/BL-70 West at US-6/BL-70 Split in Grand Junction. Merge right for US-6 West/North Ave. Merge right for BL-70 West/To US-50/Delta/Montrose.

item.title: I-70 East - Exit 11
item.description: I-70 east at Exit 11 - Mack. US-6 leaves I-70 here, although it is not signed as such on the signage.

item.title: I-70 East - Exit 2
item.description: I-70 east at Exit 2 - Rabbit Valley. This is the first exit on I-70 east in Colorado.

item.title: CO-139 North Approaching US-6
item.description: CO-139 north approaching US-6 in Loma.

item.title: CO-139 North at US-6
item.description: CO-139 north at US-6 in Loma.

item.title: End CO-139 South at I-70
item.description: Southern end of CO-139 at I-70 freeway entrance near Loma.

item.description: I-70 east at CO-340/US-6 junction in Fruita

item.title: US-50 West at CO-145/To I-70

item.description: US-50 west at CO-340 junction to Colorado National Monument

item.title: US-50 West at I-70
item.description: US-50/US-6 west at I-70 junction at western edge of Grand Junction.
